resources:
My City
Hey! Welcome to My City Glasgow
What would you like to do? Where to?
Coffee Shops Restaurants Kid Friendly Places Parks Shopping Centers
About
About My City My City is a mobile application designed to help new people discover Glasgow. Users can select from a variety of; Cafes, Restaurants, Kid Friendly Places, Parks and Shopping Centres.

The app incorporates logic to see what type of screen size the user is using. Using the screen effectively why still having the beautiful and Uniq look, no matter the device and screen size or orientation.

Note: This application is a personal project developed to showcase the skill and knowledge gained from Google’s “Android Basic with Compose” course.
Resources used The places Images used are for Illustrative purposes only and are sourced form the company website
Disclaimer This app is intended for personal use and entertainment purposes only. This application lacks external connectivity, rendering all data potentially outdated or inaccurate.

This app is a personal project and is not intended for commercial use. It utilises resources from various sources for educational and experimental purposes.
About the Creator Aaron Hamilton Android Developer @ Uniq Studio +44 7444 555 666 \@aaron-hamil5 aaron.hamil5@gmail.com
Sexy Coffee 115 Union St, Glasgow G1 3TA Sexy Coffee is a restaurant based in Glasgow.

They are popular for their; Breakfast and Solo dining.

They offer; Alcohol, Cocktails, Coffee and Quick bite

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay.
The Glad Cafe 1006A Pollokshaws Rd, Glasgow G41 2HG The Glad Cafe is a restaurant based in Glasgow. 

They are popular for their; Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Solo dining and Good for working on laptop. 

They offer; Alcohol, Beer, Cocktail, Coffee, Free water refills, Healthy options, Organic dishes, Quick bites, Small plates, Spirits, Vegan options, Vegetarian options and Wine

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay.
Kelvingrove Cafe 1161 Argyle St, Finnieston, Glasgow G3 8TB Kelvingrove Café is a restaurant based in Glasgow. 

They are popular for their; Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Solo dining and Good for working on laptop. 

They offer; Alcohol, Beer, Cocktail, Coffee, Quick bite, Small plate, Spirits and Wine.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay.
Oasis Cafe The Renfield Centre, 260 Bath St, Glasgow G2 4JP Oasis Cafe is a restaurant based in Glasgow. 

They are popular for their; Breakfast, Lunch and Solo dining. 

They offer; Coffee, Free water refills, Prepared foods, Quick bite and Vegetarian options

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards.
Restaurants Kitchen Glasgow 11 N Gower St, Glasgow G51 1PW "Kitchen Glasgow is a restaurant based in Glasgow.

They are popular for their; Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner and Solo Dining.

They offer; Coffee, Halal Food, Healthy Options, Quick Bites, Small Plates, Vegan Options and Vegetarian Options.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay."
Cioa's Cafe Restaurant 473–477 Duke St, Glasgow G31 1RD "Coia’s Cafe Restaurant is a restaurant based in Glasgow that has Snacks and produce in adjoining cafe and delicatessen with homemade Italian ice cream and takeaway.

They are popular for their; Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner and Solo Dining.

They offer; Alcohol, Beer, Cocktails, Coffee, Food, Healthy Options, Late Night Food, Quick Bite, Small Plates, Spirits, Vegan Options, Vegetarian Options and Wine.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay."
The Left Bank 33–35 Gibson St, Glasgow G12 8NU "The Left Bank is a restaurant based in Glasgow that is a Trendy open-plan bar and kitchen serving homely breakfast, bar snacks or international dishes.

They are popular for their; Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner and Solo Dining.

They offer; Alcohol, Beer, Cocktails, Coffee, Healthy Options, Late Night Food, Quick Bite, Small Plates, Spirits, Vegan Options, Vegetarian Options and Wine.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay."
The Anchor Line 12–16 St Vincent Pl, Glasgow G1 2DH "The Anchor Line is a restaurant based in Glasgow that's an Opulent New York-style bistro serving Scottish produce in the former first class booking offices.

They are popular for their; Lunch, Dinner and Solo Dining.

They offer; Alcohol, Beer, Cocktails, Coffee, Food, Food at Bar, Health Options, Late Night Food, Spirits, Wine.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay."
The Childrens Wood 76 Kelbourne St, Glasgow G20 8PR This is a park in Glasgow.

It has swings and is dog friendly.

Enjoy the local park.
Tollcross Park" 254B Wellshot Rd, Glasgow G32 7AX This is a Scenic park with a rose garden, a winter garden and a small zoo for kids with various farm animals.

It has Swings, Picnic tables, Slides and is dog friendly.

Enjoy the local park.
Wonder World Soft Play 99 Middlesex St, Kinning Park, Glasgow G41 1EE This is a softplay centre with themed adventure areas, an astro-turf football pitch, a cafe and a restaurant..

It has Football pitches and an area to clime.

Enjoy the soft play.
Maxwell Parks 126 Terregles Ave, Glasgow G41 4DQ This is a park in Glasgow.

It has Swings, Picnic tables, Slides and is dog friendly.

Enjoy the local park.
Queen's Park Langside Rd, Glasgow G42 9QL This is a park in Glasgow.

It has Basketball, Tennis courts, Picnic tables, Skateboarding, Slides, Swings and is dog friendly.

Enjoy the local park.
Kelvingrove Park Park Terrace, Glasgow G3 6BY This is a park in Glasgow.

It has Tennis courts, Picnic tables, Public toilets, Skateboarding, Slides, Swings and is dog friendly.

Enjoy the local park.
Pollok Country Park 2060 Pollokshaws Rd, Bellahouston, Glasgow G43 1AT This is a park in Glasgow.

It has Swings, Picnic tables, Public toilet, Slides and is dog friendly.

Enjoy the local park.
Bellahouston Park 16 Dumbreck Rd, Bellahouston, Glasgow G41 5BW This is a extensive park with orienteering, bowling, vivid flower/herb displays and historic granite stone..

It has Swings, Picnic tables, Public toilet, Slides and is dog friendly.

Enjoy the local park.
St. Enoch Centre 55 St Enoch Sq, Glasgow G1 4BW Sizable mall on 3 floors with department store, fashion boutiques and music shops, plus dining.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay.
Buchanan Galleries 220 Buchanan St, Glasgow G1 2FF Mall housing department store plus 90 fashion, electrical and gift outlets, and restaurants.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay.
Princes Square by M Princes Square, 48 Buchanan St, Glasgow G1 3JN Shopping mall food court with Spanish tapas, Italian and grill options as well as stylish bars.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay.
The Forge Shopping Centre 1221 Gallowgate, Glasgow G31 4EB Shopping mall hosting a supermarket, eateries and events, plus a cinema and family entertainment centre.

Come on down and give them a try, they support payments of; Cash, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, NFC Payments, Google and Apple Pay.
